actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-205.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3404) to amend the Federal Reserve Act to authorize Federal Reserve banks to lend certain obligations to the Secretary of the Treasury to meet the short-term cash requirements of the Treasury, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3404 (Federal Reserve banks).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3404) to amend the Federal Reserve Act to authorize Federal Reserve banks to lend certain obligations to the Secretary of the Treasury to meet the short-term cash requirements of the Treasury, and for other purposes.
